creator: pvy@novosoft.ru
text:
Hello!
I have apache 1.3.26 installed on W2k+all service packs + php 4.2.3
after apache working about 2-3 days apache is stopped and don't answer to any 
request. 
I got these changes in apache config file:
turn off keepalive requests
increase thread childs to 450. but anyway, apache stopped.

I don't know, may be it is not a bug... 
does anyone can help to resolve this problem?

PS: php configured to work with: Sablotron, MSSSQL, DOMXML, GD, WDDX, Acrobat 
reader files

You may be better off moving to Apache 2.0/PHP since much more attention 
  has been paid to threading issues and the like.  Apache 1.3 is no longer in
  active development and we are unlikely to be able to help given the limited
  information in your report.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
